translation: Fixing your mind on Me, you shall, by My grace, overcome all obstacles; but if you will not hear Me due to egoism, you shall perish.
commentary: 18.58 Macchittah fixing thy mind on Me? Sarvadurgaani all obstacles? By My grace by My grace? Will you (thou) shalt overcome? And now? Chet if? You thou? from egoism from egoism? Not not? Will you hear (thou) wilt hear? You will perish (thou) shalt perish.Commentary When thy mind?
